name: Nodame Cantabile: Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu
description:
Nodame Cantabile: Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu is the third instalment in the Nodame cantabile series, and an informal follow-up to the first game. It is a classical-music-based rhythm game, tasking the player with correctly tapping the notes flowing across the screen, with the DS's Stylus.

There are a Concert Hall mode with 30 tracks and a Music Salon mode with 180 tracks, alongside a trivia quiz mode with several hundreds of questions to answer.

Tracks can be selected via a search function, by linking them with the anime scene originally featuring them.
gamePlay: Game show / trivia / quiz, Music / rhythm
